keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stand up for local public services – in health, education, pensions, social care and policing.
Work with local residents for the best quality environment, tackling crime and anti-social behaviour, and combating climate change.
Keep Oxford’s economy strong, supporting businesses, jobs and training – with effective action against low pay.
Press for the housing we need so local people are able to find somewhere decent and affordable to live in our city.

issues.economy: Keep Oxford’s economy strong, supporting businesses, jobs and training – with effective action against low pay.
